name: Cardiologist
description: Specialist in heart and cardiovascular system disorders.

name: Dermatologist
description: Expert in skin, hair, and nail disorders.

name: Neurologist
description: Specializes in disorders of the brain and nervous system.

name: Orthopedic Surgeon
description: Treats conditions related to bones, joints, and muscles.

name: Pediatrician
description: Provides medical care for infants, children, and adolescents.

name: Psychiatrist
description: Treats mental, emotional, and behavioral disorders.

name: Gynecologist
description: Specialist in female reproductive health.

name: Oncologist
description: Diagnoses and treats cancer.

name: Endocrinologist
description: Treats hormone imbalances and endocrine diseases.

name: Gastroenterologist
description: Expert in digestive system disorders.

name: Pulmonologist
description: Treats respiratory tract and lung diseases.

name: Nephrologist
description: Specialist in kidney care and diseases.

name: Ophthalmologist
description: Treats eye disorders and performs eye surgery.

name: ENT Specialist
description: Treats conditions of the ear, nose, and throat.

name: Rheumatologist
description: Deals with joint, muscle, and autoimmune conditions.

name: Urologist
description: Treats urinary tract and male reproductive issues.

name: Radiologist
description: Uses imaging to diagnose and treat diseases.

name: Anesthesiologist
description: Manages anesthesia during surgeries and procedures.

name: Pathologist
description: Studies causes and effects of diseases in lab samples.

name: Hematologist
description: Specialist in blood-related disorders.

name: Allergist
description: Treats allergies and immune system disorders.

name: Immunologist
description: Deals with immune system disorders.

name: Plastic Surgeon
description: Performs cosmetic and reconstructive surgeries.

name: Vascular Surgeon
description: Treats blood vessel conditions and surgeries.

name: Thoracic Surgeon
description: Performs surgery on the chest organs.

name: Colorectal Surgeon
description: Specialist in diseases of the colon and rectum.

name: Neonatologist
description: Treats newborns, especially ill or premature babies.

name: Critical Care Specialist
description: Manages ICU and life-threatening conditions.

name: Pain Management Specialist
description: Treats chronic pain through medications and therapy.

name: Sports Medicine Specialist
description: Treats sports injuries and promotes physical fitness.

name: Geriatrician
description: Focuses on health care of the elderly.

name: Sleep Specialist
description: Diagnoses and treats sleep disorders.

name: Infectious Disease Specialist
description: Treats complex infections like HIV, tuberculosis, etc.

name: Occupational Medicine Specialist
description: Prevents and manages workplace-related illnesses.

name: Nuclear Medicine Specialist
description: Uses radioactive substances for diagnosis/treatment.

name: Reproductive Endocrinologist
description: Treats infertility and hormonal reproductive issues.

name: Medical Geneticist
description: Diagnoses and treats hereditary conditions.

name: Preventive Medicine Specialist
description: Focuses on disease prevention and public health.

name: Palliative Care Specialist
description: Manages pain and symptoms in serious illnesses.

name: Emergency Physician
description: Treats acute illnesses and injuries in emergency settings.

name: Family Physician
description: Provides comprehensive health care for individuals and families.
